description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 13). Mahoul is stationed at Sveto and remains loyal to Poseidal when Giwaza rebels.
When Amandara Kamandara reveals himself as the true Poseidal, Mahoul accompanies Mian to the Lachesis shrine in her attempt to stop him, where she dies.
name: Mahoul Senumah
